replies.body:
{{champion:21}} You can't escape from me forever Gangplank! Next time I will kill you!

{{champion:41}} You will never be able to stop me for I am the greatest pirate ever. HAHAHAHAhahahahahahaha.


{{champion:41}} Crap she really almost got me that time. If I didn't have my oranges with me that would of been it. My crew couldn't do anything against her. If I am to continue my life I am going to need some stronger crew mate but where can I fine them? Mmmmmm....I got it!!!!

_Later_

{{champion:41}} _Attention all you  landlubber. Do you want to change your boring lives? Do you want to sail the seas as a pirate and be free? If you can read this poster then you are qualified be a member for the Legendary Pirate Gangplank. Auditions will be held at the Butcher's Bridge.  _

{{champion:41}} Yeah...that looks good. Now time to head over to the bridge and see if anyone is already there. 

_At Butcher's Bridge_

{{champion:55}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:50}} 

{{champion:41}} I got a good feeling about you guys but I still need to test each of you. The first one shall be....YOU!


**Note: **A little short today but it just to introduce what this next story is about. Who did he pick? Even I don't know. But we will fine out next time.

{{champion:41}} You will always remember this as the day you almost caught Capt...
{{champion:21}} SHUT DOWN{{champion:41}}
I'm hoping for {{champion:68}} :D
{{champion:68}} +1 vote!

I had an idea for a possible new champion,and I spent a long time perfecting it/making it better. Here is a link to the new champion idea. Please take the time to read through most of it, that'd be awesome:D http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/0KVrXnIe-new-champion-idea
this is honestly a really cool idea i like it alot.
Go {{champion:9}} & {{champion:18}} !

fiddle me timbers?{{champion:9}} 
bilgewater??{{champion:55}}
{{champion:18}} or {{champion:68}} something about their size.

A Flaw in the Code Part 3
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear.
The truth about Riot is finally clear.
But first to understand, realize, comprehend,
I must say the beginning, the middle, then end

The five friends, now four, spent many months mourning
With all this depression, their lives were now boring
Til one day they swore that they'd hunt down that crook
They opened the one clue they had-their friend's book

And inside those pages was champion lore
The Freljord, Piltover, Zaun and more!
There were maps, and spells, and champions' faces
When had their dead friend designed all these places?

The creation of this book would easily take years
And all that fact did was confirm the group's fears
For as this book's secrets were seen by their eyes
They realized that this was the Spellbook of Ryze

And on the last page, his master plan was unfurled
With a big painted X was the sight of next Worlds
Can the four stop him, or will they all fail?
My friend I will see you next Summoner's Sale

Part 1
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0623-0626
Part 2
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/champion-and-skin-sale-0626-0629

That would be Gangster {{champion:29}}  XD
Oh my, Leona. Hey hey... OH NO!! THERE IS AN ANGRY CRAB COMING AFTER YOUR FOOT!
That crab REALLY wants her foot, considering dat look.......

Who has two thumbs and is getting 3 skins? This guy!

Mafia {{champion:222}} , Dragonslayer {{champion:201}}, and Pool Party {{champion:89}} . My top 2 favorite supports (i even had to sketch them out!), and the crazy and fun to use Jinx! Nice!

I'll get an RP card tomorrow on my way back home, and once home i'm getting those skins.

I'll be getting them bundles
Rito take my money O.O

Which bundle?

The Demon, Fire one, Cops, or the "You Belong in a Museum"?
Cops! Was deciding between Demon and Cops, but I only have enough RP for one bundle.
Nice choice with the Cops. Cait and  Vi, piltover's finest, look awesome.
And a I just got enough RP again for the Demon bundle when i realize, it's gone! {{item:3070}}Time for July Bundles. But nah I'll stick with the August skin sales.

AH the demon bundle is over.

That sucks. But see if the Ground Breaking is good enough (that El Tigre Braum looks awesome, trust me I have that skin).

"Patrocinado por Tecate. Tecate, con caracter" (Sponsored by Tecate. Tecate, [a beer] with Character).
Not really, and it taste awful.
Thanks for sharing?
dont hate XD
I Wanna say how inaccurate Leona's Splash art is for that skin. If she loves the sun so much, why is she hiding from it under her umbrella?
Maybe the picture was taken at the one moment where she was under the umbrella, and the rest of the time she was not under it.
And how are we supposed to figure that out? :P
Just guessing.
Exactly :P
Wait, how long have they had 4 skins on sale?  I've only ever seen 3 champs on the cover photo, is it always 4 skins?
It's usually 3 I believe. I think it is because Pool Party Leona just went on sale (because of the Team Up Rewards), so they wanted to give an extra skin?
it's because pool party leona is already on sale because of the pool party event, just like last week with pool party graves.
In a way it would make sense if they started going to 4 because there are so many more skins than there are champs and its only going to keep going that way.
1. I just noticed, I think there will be either a Gangster TF or Mafia TF. Because, look at the cards. That's TF's Blue Cards..{{champion:4}}
